channel.title: Z shell (Zsh) on Andreas Longo
channel.description: Recent content in Z shell (Zsh) on Andreas Longo

item.title: Zsh configuration files
item.description: Zsh config files and the order of sourcing during startup. 1 ~/.zshenv always sourced 2 ~/.zprofile sourced if login shell 3 ~/.zshrc sourced if interactive shell 4 ~/.zlogin sourced if login shell 5 ~/.zlogout sourced when exiting shell
